incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our API. The 30th of May 2024, the following API call will be definitely removed: GET /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/templateCapabilities Start time : 30/05/2024 08:30 UTC End time : 30/05/2024 08:45 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : This API call was previously useful for old Windows OS installers that were not compatible with installation on another diskgroup on servers with multiple diskgroups. Since then all OSes can be installed on any diskgroup. Thank you for your understanding.
